description: North of Colva is Betalbatim Beach which begins a long string of beaches with Majorda, Utorda, Arossim and Velsao at the north. It is a ten kilometre stretch of white sand which is not very crowded.
name: Betalbatim Beach

description: Agonda is a great spot for sunbathing, relaxing and swimming, with still relatively few tourists. Agonda is a nice long pristine stretch of beach and It is one of the only four beaches designated as turtle nesting sites under the Coastal Regulation Zone.
name: Agonda Beach

description: Mandrem is of the most beautiful beaches of North Goa. The white sand is dotted by Beach Shacks and one can also go on Dolphin spotting trips or explore the Mandrem Village. Junas and Ashvem are the two main beaches with shallow and calm waters which make it a great place to swim.
name: Mandrem Beach

description: Morjim is one of most secluded beaches in North Goa. It is a great place to spot a large variety of birds and Olive Ridley Turtles, hillocks and good food. Morjim is also known as mini-Russia due to a large concentration of Russian immigrants and considered to be one of the top 10 beaches in Goa.
name: Morjim Beach

description: This laid back beach hosts the Sunburn Festival in December. It has the Aguada fort overlooking the sea and the beach and is one of the best and longest beaches in Goa.
name: Candolim Beach

description: One of the best beaches in South Goa, this beautiful beach is famous for its romantic evenings, great seafood and the most happening nightlife in South Goa. Another major attraction nearby is Our Lady of Mercy Church Colva beach is located 6km north of Margao.
name: Colva Beach

description: On of the best beaches in Goa, it has a long stretch of clean sandy beach, water sports, handicraft shops, good food, resorts and budget accommodation options. Mobor Beach is situated 17km south of Margao.
name: Mobor Beach

description: Dias beach is just 3km away from Panaji. This beach is a perfect place to enjoy evening walks and can also get the beautiful view of the Aguada fort. The Dias beach is a clean beach which provides a peaceful outing for the families.
name: Dias Beach
